name: Anti-Recidivism Coalition (ARC)
description: Comprehensive reentry support including housing, employment, and education assistance
fullDescription: The Anti-Recidivism Coalition provides reentry support, advocacy, and community for formerly and currently incarcerated people in California.
whatTheyOffer:
- Reentry support and case management
- Housing assistance
- Employment support and job training
- Education navigation
- Policy advocacy
- Community and peer support
- Leadership development
howToGetIt:
1. Contact ARC intake line
2. Must be currently or formerly incarcerated
3. Complete intake assessment
4. Meet with case manager
5. Develop reentry plan
6. Access services and join community
keywords: Anti-Recidivism Coalition, ARC, reentry, formerly incarcerated, housing assistance, employment support, education, policy advocacy, peer support, case management
